website_summaries.verdict: If you're looking for a compact, affordable speaker for your bedside table that charges two iPhone or iPods simultaneously,  the Octiv Duo is well designed and offers reasonably good sound for the money.
pros: Dual docks for two iPods or iPhones
two free apps deliver full alarm clock and dual iPod-mixing functionality
electromagnetically shielded so iPhone can be used without switching to airplane mode
USB port for charging other portable devices
included remote control magnetically attaches to the back of the speaker
cons: Take away the iPhone apps and the Octiv Duo is a fairly basic iPod speaker
app doesn't automatically launch when you dock your device
circular remote control takes some getting used to

customer_reviews.title: Unfortunately WON'T CHARGE iPhone after only 3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: When first receiving this product we loved it. The sound was great, the remote was a bonus and it was great to be able to charge both our phones. However, after only having it three weeks it stopped charging on one side. I didn't want to mess with returning it so we just used one side (REALLY inconvenient when you put your phone on at night on the 'wrong' side and then take it to work dead because it didn't charge). However it just stopped charging on the OTHER side last night. Exactly 7 days after the return window. Very disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: Last Frontier Mom

customer_reviews.title: saveing myself a headache since questions are still being sent to me for this product from amazon.
customer_reviews.text: i purchased this product as a gift for my sister. unfortunately, my sisters smartphone back in 2015 was too new for compatibility. i spent some time looking for cables to adapt my sisters new phone to the older m202, there was nothing at the time. someone obviously invested money in these and is trying to get it back, problem is they're antiquated. altec lansing makes quality equipment for a third the price of bose, so purchasing their product shouldn't send you to far wrong. but when ya can't find programs (or apps for you youngsters who need cool words) that help the product work you might take a clue by that.
customer_reviews.author: Dale C. Magee

customer_reviews.title: Second one bought!
customer_reviews.text: This product is great for anywhere in the house. The accoustics are clear and it doesn't "fuzz" on the highest level of sound. While small, it does great to go from room to room (hence the second purchase). It charges everything Apple has the standard long connection for. The remote works very well and the application needed to operate the device hasn't hit a snag yet. Make sure you put the adaptors on the connectors, otherwise the plugs could get bent (much like any Apple stand).
customer_reviews.author: dealhunter

customer_reviews.title: Christmas Gift
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a Christmas gift for my wife. It replaced a tangle of charger wires and adapters on a kitchen counter, one for her Kindle one for her iPod, one for my iPhone. Charges all of them, the usb port is a nice touch. At first I would have liked an AM/FM radio feature, but dock her iPod, connect to the household access point and with live internet streaming of radio on tap your good to go. Sound quality is good, and the remote is handy from across the room.
customer_reviews.author: Volpone

customer_reviews.title: piece of crap
customer_reviews.text: when the product was delivered, the speaker didn't work..I couldn't get any sound out of it whatsoever..tried calling the company & they only take support calls for this specific product on certain days..I wasn't going to wait around for an entire weekend to figure out what was going on with it so I just sent it back..return process was excellent through Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Altec Lansing M202 Dual-Charging iPod Dock
customer_reviews.text: Altec Lansing M202 Dual-Charging iPod Dock was delivered quickly. I have it in my guest room. It is small and fits on a night table. It has a remote and can accommodate iphone 4 and below in the docking station. The iphone 5 can hook up through a wire. I bought one and keep it there, so whatever kind of device my guests have, they can listen to their music and charge their devices.
customer_reviews.author: Ranchwoman

customer_reviews.title: Sounds muddy, charging contacts stop working
customer_reviews.text: I've used this for about 4 months months. It's okay, but it really makes music sound bad, and isn't the whole point of this to play music? The sound is muddy and mid-rangey, not clear. There's no EQ to change this. Also, the charging contacts already have stopped working intermittently. They're not bent or cracked, they just don't charge sometimes, even when the iPhone's case is off.
customer_reviews.author: JAtlanta

customer_reviews.title: Much More Than Expected
customer_reviews.text: Never expected this product to be as good as it is. I was just looking for a reasonably priced iPod doc so I could listen to my music while puttering around the house. Frankly, I wasn't all that concerned with quality of sound but was very surprised at what this little docking station had to offer in that respect, which is GREAT sound quality. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Donna D

customer_reviews.title: Read the SPECS carefully
customer_reviews.text: It works well, but not as expected. I have an older version IPOD and my husband has a newer version. We bought this to take on vacation and shuffle between our music library. You have to download software to use the feature that allows you to shuffle between the IPODs. It doesn't work with my older IPOD.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NEW USE FOR ALTEC M202
customer_reviews.text: I HAVE SEVERAL OF THESE ....LOVE THE SOUND...USED THEM WHEN I HAD 30 PIN IPHONES AND IPODS... NOW I USE THEM WITH MY AMAZON ECHO DOTS WHICH I PUT ON TOP AND CONNECT TO DOTS PIN PLUG OUTLET TO ALTEC PIN PLUG INPUT....WOKS AND SOUNDS GREAT!!!
customer_reviews.author: Howard F Halligan

customer_reviews.title: this is awsome
customer_reviews.text: the size is incredible for the sound only problem i can see with it is that it does not have a radio or clock. But when used with ipods you can use your own I read. waiting for the next one for my sons they have ipod touches the girls just have ipods but they love it fills the room with musice for the sound. How they can mave this better make a wireles unit same size same sound
customer_reviews.author: David S. Ochoa

customer_reviews.title: Did not work with any of our Apple Devices
customer_reviews.text: We have several Apple products we tried on this device....3 ipods and 2 iphones. The stereo only worked with one of the devices and the charging station only worked on the right side of the device. We returned it.
customer_reviews.author: Amy A.

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound!
customer_reviews.text: The only qualm I have with this is that my iPhone needs to be docked in order for it to work. Other than that it's perfect. A bluetooth option would be great. The remote is fantastic and the sound quality is amazing
customer_reviews.author: Aldrine

customer_reviews.title: Either spend more for better, or spend less for almost the same.
customer_reviews.text: :( -The power plug box wines with a high pitch for as long as it is plugged in, regardless if the unit is on or off. -If your device has a case or covering, you'll have to take it off to use the dock. :) -Sound quality is excellent. -Good price.
customer_reviews.author: G. Adams

customer_reviews.title: so far sogood
customer_reviews.text: goodu must be over 13 in order to write reviews on Amazon. Your review will be marked as an Amazon Verified Purchase. We will email you as soon as your review is processed. Here are some tips for writing great reviews: Do explain why you liked or disliked this product. Do compare to similar products and share how long you've used this product. Do identify specific attributes (e.g. comfort & fit of a shirt or the battery life of a camera) and whether they met your expectations. Don't describe your seller or shipping experience (you can d
customer_reviews.author: fan

customer_reviews.title: Great at first
customer_reviews.text: The unit has stopped charging iphones and ipods after 3 months. The remote stopped working after a month. I expect it will soon stop working all together . . . Also Altec Lansing's customer service and repairs is like pulling teeth. Run far and fast.
customer_reviews.author: Dynorat

customer_reviews.title: Works good.
customer_reviews.text: I do love this dock. I love how it charges my phone while I listen to music cleaning, but sometimes it wont recognize my phone and actually play music so I have to pick my phone up and put it back on or unplug the dock a couple times which can be a pain. I recently bought the iphone adapter pin for the 5 and it fits perfectly and plays my music. :)
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied with it. but.....
customer_reviews.text: I like the product, I only wish it could also run on batteries to make it portable you can only charge one I phone. I thought I could use it to recharge two Iphones at the same time, but that is not the case. the sound is comparable to similar speakers. Around $50 is worth it. I'm satisfied
customer_reviews.author: Mark P

customer_reviews.title: Great for a docking station
customer_reviews.text: This was better than I expected. Great sound with reasonable volume. It does not touch the Beats or Bose Bluetooth systems, but for a desktop dock station this is one of the best.
customer_reviews.author: AW515

customer_reviews.title: Great for small areas
customer_reviews.text: These speakers pack a punch. Wont fill the largest room for sound but I have a studio and it works fine for me. Sound fills my room. Looks good too and the fact that it has 2 docks is unique. I have no use for it but if you happened to have 2 ipods at some point, you can play music between the two randomly. Wont work for the new iphone 5 though cause it wont fit the docks. But you can connect a usb or aux wire to the back. Figure you can charge or play music like that with the newer devices.

customer_reviews.title: Horrible.....!!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I would never recommend this product. It was embarrassing I bought it for my wife for Christmas and out of the box on Christmas morning it didnt work. And its because of the Ipod I tried two the classic and the touch. Nothing!!!! Horrible product

customer_reviews.title: Good sound from a small package
customer_reviews.text: This will not work if you have a otter box or hard cover for your Iphone 4. It fits my Iphone 3 with it's cover on. Sounds great, easy to move around and doesn't take up much room. Simple to use, remote is a nice touch.
customer_reviews.author: Dirt Diva

customer_reviews.title: Not compatible with Lightning cable without adapter
customer_reviews.text: The correct item arrived, but the detailed description claimed "Compatible with all iPod and iPhone Models". I had to buy a $30 adapter from Apple to make it compatible with my iPod 7. I assume this is an oversight that allowed old copy to remain posted after the new Apple lightening connector devices arrived, and there is a fix (for $30), so I'm only subtracting 1 star from an otherwise good experience.
customer_reviews.author: Bob S.

customer_reviews.title: Never worked right
customer_reviews.text: Product either didn't work at all or worked with static like it had a short. No real user's manual and no help from website. I am through buying cheap junk made in China like this item.

customer_reviews.title: This thing is AMAZING!!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent sound quality- very simple to use. Looks great, we bring it with us when we travel, HIGHLY recommended!! I bought one for myself and one for my daughter. I have a more expensive one, and this one is BY FAR better.

customer_reviews.title: Quick delivery, very good product, great service from seller.
customer_reviews.text: Delivery came with in about 4 - 5 days. This little speaker system is no Bose but for the price it sounds pretty good and it has some really excellent features. If you are not looking to blow up the room with sounds (because it does not go very loud but it is loud enough). I think most people will enjoy this system.
customer_reviews.author: Xavier Orion

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is horrible, the USB port becomes loose and inoperable. The Ipod charging male pieces are the same way. I Wish I knew this thing would fall apart before I used it. The speakers were good, but every way to plug in an Apple product broke with in 3 months of light use. I have begone to hate this product. I'm warning you, please find something else.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan

customer_reviews.title: It charges, it sings, what else could you want?
customer_reviews.text: Nice for the price. I just hit buttons on the remote until something plays. Certainly not made for harcore audiophiles, but it gets the job done and lets you hum along. My only problem is remembering to pick up my phone on the way out the door.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin Combs

customer_reviews.title: Sound is great. Quality is great
customer_reviews.text: it served us well until new iphone 8 pin cables! Damn U apple. Sound is great. Quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Jubyloo

customer_reviews.title: poor audio
customer_reviews.text: no range at all. the speakers can not keep up with the slightest bass. I was very upset with the product and took it back the next day. i guess if you played elevator music at work this would be for you....
customer_reviews.author: The Tates

customer_reviews.title: Altec Lansing M202
customer_reviews.text: These speakers rock! They are smaller than I thought they would be, but I am happy with that. The sound is pretty kickin', I forget I am listening to my phone/ipod.
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: Very good sound, smooth desin, excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: Altec Lansing M202 is a very powerful iPhone-compatible speaker. The overall sound quality is very good, however, you may feel that playback of low frequency tones could be improved. Although remember, this is NOT a Hi-Fi set! The design and the quality is excellent. The dual-charging dock is very convenient and allows mixing musing from both iPhones/iPod devices at the same time. The remote controller has many useful features.
customer_reviews.author: Bartosz

customer_reviews.title: Love it love it
customer_reviews.text: This dock doesn't take up a lot of room - charges TWO iphones or ipods - and sounds awesome. I bought my daughter a JVC on stage dock for Christmas last year and this thing blows it away. Much more bass from this dock... it really sounds great. I see people complaining about the iPhone apps for the dock. I like them. I use the alarm clock - the mixer thing I will probably never use but I tried it and it works perfect. No complaints on any of these from me. Great deal - I'd buy it again in a heartbeat.

customer_reviews.title: Amazing Sound!

product_meta.title: Altec Lansing M202 Dual-Charging iPod Dock (30-pin connector)
product_meta.description:
Ipod home audio dock with dual chargers

FROM THE MANUFACTURER


Have more than one iDevice in your family? The Altec Lansing Octiv Duo has you covered. Adding a new twist on the duel dock speaker, the Octiv Duo lets you charge and play two iPhone/iPods at the same time. Its unique wedge design fits nicely in kitchen nooks, bedrooms, and just about anywhere. And the innovative Music Mix App allows you to shuffle through all the music on both devices, hopefully ending the music battle in your house.

AT A GLANCE:
 * Dual-docking speaker charges and plays your iPhones and iPods at the same time
   
   
 * Free Music Mix app shuffles the music of both docked devices
   
   
 * Built-in USB port lets you charge a third device
   
   
 * Compact, wedge-shaped profile fits anywhere
   
   
 * Room-filling sound with enhanced bass response
   
   
 * Full-featured remote control included
   
   
 * Works with all iPhone and iPod models

Charge and play two iDevices simultaneously. View larger.DUAL-DOCKING SPEAKER CHARGES AND PLAYS IPHONE AND IPOD
Imagine charging two iPhones or iPods and listening to your favorite tunes at the same time. The Octiv Duo lets you do just that--it docks, charges, and plays two iDevices at once. Have more than 2 devices that need charging? That is no longer a problem--with the built-in USB charging port you can plug in a third device such as a Blackberry, Droid, or Bluetooth Headset, and with the aux in jack you can play the tunes from those devices as well. 

BIG SOUND IN A SMALL PACKAGE
The stylish Octiv Duo has a footprint of only 3.8 by 10.7 by 5.7 inches (H x W x D), but with Audio Alignment technology you get the same amazing clarity and room-filling sound for which Altec Lansing is famous. And thanks to its innovative wedge design, the Octiv Duo tucks nicely into corners, saving space and fitting just about anywhere.

With duel firing ports on the sides of the Octiv Duo, you'll be able to hear fantastic low end bass tones that you wouldn't normally hear on such a small speaker. And to make sure your audio is always optimized, the Octiv Duo includes built-in shielded protection to prevent magnetic interference from the iPhone 4 and other mobile devices.

INCLUDED MUSIC MIX APP
Downloadable free to your iPhone or iPod Touch (with iOS 3.1 or later), the innovative Music Mix app allows you to seamlessly shuffle through all the music on both your devices. Using the colored slider at the top, you can choose what percentage of music you want playing from each device. Music Mix also displays battery levels, so you know when your gadgets are charged, and it turns on the stereo widening feature of the Octiv Duo.

Convenient remote attaches magnetically to speaker's reverse side. View larger.HANDY, FULL-FEATURED REMOTE
With the Octiv Duo, there's no need to get up from your comfortable chair to change tunes or adjust the volume. A convenient full-featured remote puts control in the palm of your hand. And when the unit is not in use, the remote clicks in magnetically to the back of the speaker.

COMPATIBLE WITH ALL IPOD AND IPHONE MODELS
The Octiv Duo works with all models of iPhones and iPods including the iPhone 4 and the new iPod Touch and Nano models, so all you need to do is dock, play, and charge. And the Octiv Duo features the "Works with iPhone" and "Made for iPod" certifications, so you're assured it meets Apple's strict performance standards. 

The Altec Lansing Octiv Duo is backed by a one-year limited warranty.

ABOUT ALTEC LANSING: 70 YEARS OF AUDIO INNOVATION
For more than 70 years, Altec Lansing has been shaping the history of sound delivery. The company boasts a unique history of invention that includes the introduction of the first "talkie" film speakers, the first set of desktop computer speakers, the first iPod docking station, and the first "Works with iPhone" speaker system. Altec Lansing, LLC is and American company headquartered in Milford, Pennsylvania.
